content: Winapi crate is so central to many crates that supports windows in a platform-specific way. Should it live side-by-side with https://github.com/rust-lang/libc ?

This discussion should probably go on the github issue about this exact matter, not zulip.

https://github.com/retep998/winapi-rs/issues/268
ok... but you see i raised this exact question three years ago in that exact issue, and no one responds...

Hey all - Ryan from Microsoft here. We are working on something that might make winapi maintenance much easier. We're trying to generate Rust win32 bindings from metadata. No promises that this will turn into something real, but we hope to have a very rough version out soon for everyone to look at and hopefully contribute to soon.
This would in essence be similar to the WinRT bindings we've been working on
@Ryan Levick That sounds extremely helpful! I'd love to see that.

@Peter Rabbit I just read through that whole github issue. I was under the impression that the "merge back into a single crate with features" step you mentioned in https://github.com/retep998/winapi-rs/issues/268#issuecomment-196563081 had happened, right?
